scenario_text.value:
Even without Piedmon’s flights of fancy, his
orders are totally overboard...

But, like... We’re the ones following those
crazy commands, ain’t we?
Well whaddaya expect from a bunch wimps?

(This is weird. I know they’re enemies, but
I’m starting to feel bad for them...)

Ho boy... It’d be swell to have a nice head
honcho for once...

Anyone’d be good, ’long as they reel it in
with the reckless requests...
